    • Method Detail

      • getBaseRelationByName

        public IMondixRelation getBaseRelationByName(java.lang.String relationName)
        Description copied from interface: IMondixInstance
        Retrieves the mondix base relation of the specified name.
        Specified by:
        getBaseRelationByName in interface IMondixInstance
        Parameters:
        relationName - the name of the relation to return
        Returns:
        the single relation whose name is the given string, or null if none exists

      • getCatalogRelation

        public IMondixRelation getCatalogRelation()
        Description copied from interface: IMondixInstance
        Returns the catalog relation that lists all relations published by this mondix instance.

        The catalog relation is guaranteed to:

        • contain a column called "name" that indicates the names of each published relation (including the catalog itself)
        • have the empty string as name

        Equivalent to calling IMondixInstance.getBaseRelationByName(String) with an empty string parameter

        Specified by:
        getCatalogRelation in interface IMondixInstance

      • getPublishedRelationNames

        public IUnaryQueryInstance getPublishedRelationNames()
        Description copied from interface: IMondixInstance
        Returns a query into the catalog relation that lists the names of all relations published by this mondix instance.

        Equivalent to calling IMondixInstance.getCatalogRelation() and opening a query instance that selects the column "name" only.

        Specified by:
        getPublishedRelationNames in interface IMondixInstance
